extendedInfo.description: âââââââââââiKnow! for AndroidâiKnow! is a companion tool for the iKnow! website (http://iknow.jp/). With this application, you can enjoy the iKnow! study experience on the Android device and sync your learning with your online account.This application has a free trial period of five study sessions. To continue studying after five sessions, you need to become a paying Pro iKnow! member. iKnow! Pro membership details can be found here: http://iknow.jp/pricing.âââââââââââScience-based language learningâiKnow! presents items in a pattern optimized for efficient learning. This application calculates an optimal moment to review what you have learned so that you can learn efficiently and effectively. Text, sample sentences, images, and sound combine to create an effective and compelling study experience.âGuided studyâiKnow! tells you what to study and when. Just set which courses to focus on and how much you want to study every week. Based on your targets and performance, iKnow! manages your study for you.âOfficial coursesâOfficial courses are currently offered for studying Japanese and English.ââââââââââFeatures:- A mobile learning environment as comfortable as studying on a PC.- Your study progress is synched to your PC account.- You can manage courses you are studying.*3G or Wi-Fi connection is required to download course content and to start the learning application.*Each course download uses about 10MB of storage space. Please make sure there is enough available memory on your device or SD card before downloading.ââââââââââTo use this app, you must first create an account at iknow.jp or on your Android smartphone. You can search for courses and choose which ones to study. Selected courses will then be available to study from the iKnow! application. Your iKnow! study progress on this app is automatically synched to your PC account, so you can study in the way that best matches your needs and lifestyle.ââââââââââ*Please see our site blog (http://blog.iknow.jp/en/) to keep up with important announcements from us.Follow us on Twitter! >> @iKnowTeamââââââââââhttp://iknow.jp/www.cerego.comCerego Japan Inc is a learning technology company established in 2000.ââââââââââ

reviews.title: not working
reviews.comment: it not work at all. when i launch this app a black screan pop up and  the app shout down. I\'m using galaxy note 10.1
reviews.author: Dawid P

reviews.title: Great improvements!
reviews.comment: So much closer to the desktop app I love it!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite useful
reviews.comment: Quite nice app. A couple of issues though:   - When selecting \"correct\", the example sentences are skipped, which is quite a shame  - The included keyboard tends to ignore some keypress (sound play, but the press is not registered).  Overall quite a good companion to the website for people on the go.
reviews.author: Kenfe-Micka\303\253l Laventure

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Perfect. It works exactly like it should.
reviews.author: Alex Mahr

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love the new changes. Now please bring on a lightweight version of Brainspeed to this app! Using the study mode and dictation is sometimes cumbersome. We need a fast paced and easy to use feature like brainspeed on mobile devices.
reviews.author: Kai Jaegersen

reviews.title: would give 5 stars
reviews.comment: But keyboard shortcut behaviour is completely neglected. I use I know with key board short cuts only for some reason the app doesn\'t support it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay Dictation
reviews.comment: Finally you\'ve added dictation to the app, best news ever, now if we could get more of the sites goodness on the go it will continue to be the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: thanks
reviews.comment: great customer support. polite and prompt response!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dear Henry
reviews.comment: No there\'s nothing better and free. Anki with Core decks is an inferior experience to using iKnow. Especially if you need to sync to multiple devices which is annoying to set up and maintain with Anki. I don\'t think this is the place to say such things either.   Great app. Great service.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: It\'s great but it needs to add how-to-right feature, also add new ways of payment.. Like visa please Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: almost perfect
reviews.comment: would be ideal to have brainspeed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Overpriced but app is ok
reviews.comment: Ya know you guys there are free alternatives like the flash card app anki, which also happens to have a better SRS built on. And did I mention its free? *edit* looking back I have to change my review. iKnow does have some advantages over anki. I think the structured lessons are a better motivating factor for studying. I still think that the iknow service is still a bit overpriced, but I understand that the content is rich, complete, and professional,  and that the authors must make a profit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: It\'s ust amazing. The only thing I would add would be the brainspeed mode. Appart from that, it is perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews given!

reviews.title: Love love love it!
reviews.comment: Attached to an account it is a great tool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: After a recent system update for the Toshiba Thrive, I am no longer having any troubles with this app. Audio for personal lists works fine now. Definitely a great app for studying on the go!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My favorite android app
reviews.comment: Best way to learn Japanese on the go hands down, allows me to be productive where ever I go. Worth every penny also, monthly fee insures future app development and high quality upgrades and content.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for learning kanji!
reviews.comment: Totally worth the money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Japanese learning app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve learned so many words in Japanese using this app that I understand Japanese a lot better now! (  o..o)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: I tried basically all Japanese learning Apps. This is the best one. Having iKnow installed for studying, and a dictionary (like JED) to look up words, I can\'t be happier.
reviews.author: A Google User
